sourcesContent:
export const classes = [
  {
    className: "mage",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 16,
    int: 150,
    spd: 50,
    agi: 11,
    color: "#3FC7EB",
    icon: "mageIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
  {
    className: "voleur",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 44,
    int: 20,
    spd: 80,
    agi: 12,
    color: "#FFF468",
    icon: "rogueIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
  {
    className: "guerrier",
    hp: 100,
    atk: 130,
    int: 10,
    spd: 30,
    agi: 10,
    color: "#C69B6D",
    icon: "warriorIcon",
    potions: 2,
  },
];
